scripts.deno-install: curl -fsSL https://deno.land/x/install/install.sh | sh && export DENO_INSTALL="~/.local" &&  export PATH="$DENO_INSTALL/bin:$PATH"
scripts.watch-file-changes: nodemon -w ./src --exec "npm run deno" -e "js ts json mjs"
scripts.start: npm run deno-install && npm run set-up-types && npm run watch-file-changes
